To ease Wu's panic about how people would recognize him as the king, Gun showed him the earring and urged the monarch to look at it as a royal brooch which could be worn in lieu of a crown. As the Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se attempted to pin the brooch on Wu's chest to convince him that it would work, Wu stormed off, though he ultimately accepted the item during the ceremony. When Kuvira denounced Wu's authority in the Earth Kingdom, establishing herself as the new ruler of the "Earth Empire", Wu pointed at the brooch to emphasize his title as the rightful ruler of the Earth Kingdom.
